name: Christmas Soap Sampler
description:
This season's soaps are cut into convenient bars and packaged into sampler packs, making them perfect as x'mas presents.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Listing is for 3 bars of soap of about 125g in total.

Each is individually packaged and labelled as shown.

name: Summer Rain
description:
This is an uplifting and energising soap.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

With the summer heat in mind, this soap is sudsy with a gentle foam.  Enriched with french green clay, it helps to re-balance moisture in skin and absorb and take away impurities.

Clary sage and lavender essential oils lend antiseptic and anti-viral properties, invigorating the mind, body and spirit.  Aloe vera extract soothes the skin against sunburn and other minor injuries.  

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Listing is for bar of soap of about 80g.

Each is individually packaged and labelled as shown.

name: Provence Floral French Clay
description:
This is a floral and bubbly soap.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Pleasantly fragranced by natural lavender and sweet marjoram essential oils, this soap is also rich in organic french pink clay which helps to re-balance moisture in skin and absorb and take away impurities.

Grapeseed oil has extra fine texture which can easily be absorbed, leaving the skin supple and clean.  Cocoa butter is highly emollien and skin-pampering.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Listing is for bar of soap of about 70g.

Each is individually packaged and labelled as shown.

name: Almond Vanilla Milk
description:
This is a gentle and moisturising soap which calms you down.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Some of the most soothing essential oils like frankincense and melissa in this soap help to relieve stress and tension.  Loaded with pomace olive oil and olive butter, this is also a skin-pampering olive soap.  

Sweet almond oil is rich in minerals, vitamins and proteins, with softening and nourishing properties.  Cocoa butter is highly emollient.  Palm kernel oil gives the soap a gentle lather.  

Vanilla is one of my favorite ingredients in baking.  Caviar from vanilla pod is gently steeped in milk to produce this indulgent, vanilla flavored soap.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Listing is for bar of soap of about 100g.

Each is individually packaged and labelled as shown.

name: Sunny Citrus
description:
This is a fruity and refreshing soap.

:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Rice bran oil is rich in Vitamin E, keeping skin soft and supple.  It can also be easily absorbed by the skin leaving it clean and fresh.

A sudsy formula with fresh carrot puree makes this soap a bath treat full of vitamins and minerals to deliver.  A gentle scrub comes from fine poppyseeds, enhanced by lemon extract and fruity sweet orange and bergamot essential oils.

:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Listing is for bar of soap of about 100g.

Each is individually packaged and labelled as shown.

name: Honey Rose Cream
description:
This is a moisturising face soap with anti-ageing properties.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Rose geranium is one of my favorite essential oils.  It lends a gentle floral calmness to the soap.  Chamomile essential oil is a powerful anti-inflammatory, which also works wonders to sooth and heal skin allergies.  

Olive oil has excellent moisturising qualities, and sweet almond oil is fast penetrating with skin softening properties.  The special face soap formula includes plant-derived glycerin to pamper skin and retain moisture and emollience.  

A whitening Chinese medicine powder including pearl and other precious Chinese medicine extracts is added for a smooth complexion and to reduce the production of pigmentation.

The soap is partly cream so that the face would not feel tight or dried out after use.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Listing is for bar of soap of about 90g.

Each is individually packaged and labelled as shown.

name: Lotion Bar
description:
Here is a lotion bar which is preservative and color free, handy enough to take with you on travelling.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Made with gentle sweet almond oil, emollient and skin-softening shea butter and mango butter with superb moisturising properties, this solid lotion bar helps to replenish moisture and smoothness on the body after baths or on hands just like a handcream.

Simply rub the bar gently in your hands to release the moisture rich emollients with your body heat.  Then enjoy the silky smoothness when the lotion melts on your skin.  Return the lotion bar to its aluminum tin container after use.

Since the lotion bar is free of preservative and color and only lightly scented, it can be safely used on delicate or sensitive skin.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Listing is for one lotion bar of about 60g.

Please allow one week for production.

name: Lipbalm DIY Kit
description:
This is a custom order of the lipbalm DIY kit.

The kit will contain sufficient materials for making 6 tubes of lipbalm of a single color and/or a single fragrance of about 5ml each.  It comes with full instructions.

All you need on your own are your creativity, a small glass beaker or jar to heat the materials in a waterbath, and a stirring rod or skewer stick.

Available lipbalm colors include coral pink and copper.  Intensity of the color depends on amount of the mica mineral powder you use.  Some of the available lipbalm fragrances include banana, strawberry, chocolate, coffee, vanilla, honey, yuzu, etc.  Please feel free to contact me if you wish to obtain the entire list.  You may also choose to have silver or gold pearlescent mica for a shine effect.

Upon receipt of your order and payment, you will be contacted as to which color / fragrance / shine you wish to purchase.

name: Mother's Milk Marseille
description:
This is a custom made order of about 500g of pure mother's milk marseille soap using mother's milk supplied by you.

Marseilles are traditional Italian soaps of at least 72% olive oil.  The rich olive oil content makes the soaps very moisturising for the skin.  

Mother's milk is known to contain exceptional nutrients, which makes it a precious food for infants.  Soaps made of mother's milk are said to have the ability to benefit sensitive skin and soothe skin irritations such as eczema.  It is also popular to be used as a face soap and is said to work magic on skin.  To me, it is also a great way to turn leftover mother's milk into something the babies can derive benefit from.

Before ordering, please make sure you have or will be able to collect at least 150ml of mother's milk.  Upon receipt of order and payment, you will be contacted so that we could work out as to how to collect your mother's milk and when the custom batch will be made.  You will also be given the choices of essential oils and other additives.  Some of the more popular ones are lavender and rosehip.  Please allow 5 weeks after soap production for the curing of this cold-processed soap.

Soaps will be cut into about 50g each and individually packaged and labelled.
